original_query: How much money did Anmol Singh paid to DLF to buy an apartment in Camelias indirectly? Search local storage agian

perception.result_requirement: Amount paid by Anmol Singh to DLF for apartment in Camelias indirectly
perception.reasoning: Memory contains the answer to the user query regarding the amount paid by Anmol Singh to DLF indirectly for an apartment in 'The Camellias'.
perception.local_reasoning: Memory excerpt contains the relevant amount (Rs. 42.94 Crore) and parties involved.
perception.summarizer_summary: Funds originating from Gensol Engineering Limited, which included a loan from IREDA, were transferred via Capbridge and Jasminder Kaur to DLF as part of the consideration (Rs. 42.94 Crore) for the purchase of an apartment in 'The Camellias' project.
